welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Three Lakes, where the serene beauty of our three lakes will enchant you. Enjoy our charming town known for its outdoor adventures, quaint shops, and friendly community. We hope you have a memorable stay exploring all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tamiami Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miami International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal primarily used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal serving primarily international flights, including those from Latin America and the Caribbean.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
